direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods compare OpenAPI documents but handle different input types (String vs. File).
Both methods compare OpenAPI documents from different locations (content vs. location).
Both methods perform comparisons on OpenAPI specifications with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods read OpenAPI content from strings, sharing similar resource access patterns.
Both methods read OpenAPI content but from different sources (content vs. location).

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of the OpenAPIParser for reading OpenAPI content.
Reading content is a prerequisite for comparison in fromContents.
Reading location is a prerequisite for comparison in fromLocations.
Both methods handle OpenAPI specifications and manage similar exceptions.
